name: aeo-chain-analyzer
description: AI-powered Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) analysis tool with Korean localization

scripts.dashboard-open: npm run dashboard & sleep 2 && (open http://localhost:8080/dashboard.html || start http://localhost:8080/dashboard.html || xdg-open http://localhost:8080/dashboard.html)
scripts.models: node -e "console.log('Model configuration not yet implemented. Please edit .taskmaster/config.json manually.')"
scripts.models-setup: node -e "console.log('Interactive model setup not yet implemented. Please edit .taskmaster/config.json manually.')"
scripts.setup: cp env.example .env && echo 'Please edit .env with your API keys'

author: AEO Chain Analyzer Team
